note.item: Please view commit history at Google Code for details.
You could prevent FoxTrick from poping up this release note after each update by disabling "Show release notes after FoxTrick updates" in main tab.
LiveAlert for alerting at HT Live goals. (ryanli)
OldStyleFace for showing faces in old Hattrick style. (Aimo_Kanuuna)
NtPeek for peeking NT/U20 matches at My Hattrick. (ryanli)
SeriesFlags for showing user country and series in guestbook. It's based on the earlier GuestbookAlltidFlags module, images provided by HTMS. (taised)
HTMSPoints for showing player's HTMS Points, i.e. numeralized ability and potential. (taised)
FriendlyInterface with options for showing player's full name in match line up page and showing national teams in links for NT players. (ryanli)
Option to hide forum sneak-peek in FixcssProblems. (ljushaff)
New grey icon for report links. (ljushaff)
YouthPromotes also shows the earliest date to promote a player. (ryanli)
Most features working under Google Chrome. (ryanli)
Some trivial fixes for latest Hattrick changes. (ryanli)
Radio options in ExtraShortcuts are disabled by default. (ryanli)
